activities.summary: User downloaded medical prescription from manipal hospital,whitefield mentioning symptoms like fever and fatigue lasting two days. Doctor's diagnosis states a seasonal viral infection, advised rest, and prescribed fever-reducing and anti-inflammatory medication.

User wrote a note late at night reflecting on personal goals for the new year in terms of handling distress in life, aiming for a work-life balance, improving daily routines, prioritizing health, and spending more time on meaningful activities.

User read ebook focused on personal finance, specifically covering basics of index funds, long-term investing, and risk diversification. The reading appeared self-motivated and aligned with improving financial awareness.
